title: Cant buy runes
body: I try to buy runes in the store (obviously runes I do not own) but it tells me there is an error. I have enough IP and they are runes I do not own. I have tried to submit tickets for it but nothing has come from it. Idk what to do.

replies.body: Are you receiving a specific error message? If so, can you let me know what it says or [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) for me?

https://gyazo.com/a1cbcdf11a22cf25daaa4583dfa38944
https://gyazo.com/c0fb3b32d920db164d6d528469d7abbb
I have the IP for it so i dont know why i cant buy it

Ah, it seems you may own too many runes already, especially if you still have tier 1 or 2 runes. I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you sort this out for good.
Oooh okay. I wasnt aware that there was a limit. Thank you for the help c:
